Events that occurred on 12 May

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien is declared fit for home service.
1879 - Percy Bates is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 68.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 269.
2004 - "Reflections", the ninth set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
